erik.name: Erik Kristiansson
erik.title: Professor
erik.bio:
I work with bioinformatics and have several big projects going on. Currently, I have five PhD students and one postdoc. 
 Very good in terms of computer.

anna.name: Anna Johnning
anna.title: Researcher
anna.bio: I specialize in microbial resistance and genomic analysis. My work focuses on understanding antibiotic resistance mechanisms.

mikael.name: Mikael Gustavsson
mikael.title: Researcher
mikael.bio: My research focuses on computational biology and systems biology approaches to solve biological problems.

david.name: David Lund
david.title: PhD Student
david.bio: I am working on machine learning applications in bioinformatics and genomics.

styrbjorn.name: Styrbjörn Käll
styrbjorn.title: PhD Student
styrbjorn.bio: My research involves statistical modeling and data analysis in bioinformatics.

sophia.name: Sophia Axillus
sophia.title: PhD Student
sophia.bio: I focus on studying microbial genomics and antibiotic resistance.

laleh.name: Laleh Varghaei
laleh.title: PhD Student
laleh.bio: My research is centered on computational methods for analyzing biological data.

helga.name: Helga Kristín Ólafsdóttir
helga.title: Postdoc
helga.bio: I work on developing new computational tools for genomic data analysis.
